concept.description: Adds the labels "XO" and "Label" to all interfaces representing XO labels.
Adds a label "PluginDescriptor" to classpath resources "/META-INF/jqassistant-plugin.xml".
Creates a relationship REGISTERS_MODEL from /model/class-XML nodes to the corresponding model types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:PluginDescriptor)-[:HAS_ROOT_ELEMENT]->()-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(model:Element{name:"model"}), (model)-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(class:Element)-[:HAS_TEXT]->(className:Text) WITH class, className MATCH (:Main:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type) WHERE className.value = type.fqn MERGE (class)-[:REGISTERS_MODEL]->(type) RETURN type.fqn as Type

constraint.description: All XO @Label types must be registered in the plugin descriptor.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (label:XO:Label) WHERE NOT ()-[:REGISTERS_MODEL]->()-[:IMPLEMENTS*0..]->(label) RETURN label as UnregisteredLabel

constraint.description:
XO @Label-interfaces should not be registered explicitly if a deriving interface registers it implicitly.
Rationale: Reduce class loading/initialization time at startup in larger classpath contexts (e.g. Maven plugin).
constraint.cypher: MATCH ()-[:REGISTERS_MODEL]->(label:XO:Label), (subLabel:XO:Label)-[:IMPLEMENTS*]->(label) RETURN label as Label, collect(subLabel) as SubLabels

constraint.description:
Starting with version 1.10 of the XML Schema for plugins, the root element of the plugin descriptor must carry the id attribute. The id itself must start with the prefix 'jqa.'.
An example for a valid root element declaration for a plugin descriptor must look like this
<jpd:jqassistant-plugin xmlns:jpd="http://schema.jqassistant.org/plugin/v1.10" name="<Name of the Plugin>" id="jqa.plugin.<pluginid>"> ...
constraint.cypher:
MATCH (descriptorFile:File:Xml)
WHERE descriptorFile.fileName ENDS WITH "/src/main/resources/META-INF/jqassistant-plugin.xml"
WITH descriptorFile
MATCH (pd:PluginDescriptor) -[:HAS_ROOT_ELEMENT]->(rootElement:Xml {name: 'jqassistant-plugin'}) , (rootElement)-[:DECLARES_NAMESPACE]->(ns:Xml:Namespace)
OPTIONAL MATCH (rootElement) -[:HAS_ATTRIBUTE]->(attribute:Xml:Attribute {name: 'id'})
WITH pd, rootElement, attribute, ns
WHERE attribute IS NULL OR NOT (attribute.value STARTS WITH "jqa.plugin.") OR ns.prefix <> "jpd" OR ns.uri <> "http://schema.jqassistant.org/plugin/v1.10"
RETURN *
